actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend certain transitional rules for allowing a charitable contribution deduction for purposes of the estate tax in the case of bequests or transfers of certain charitable remainders.

summary.text: Extends, under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, specified transitional rules for allowing a charitable contribution deduction for purposes of the estate tax in the case of bequests or transfers of specified charitable remainders. (Adds 26 U.S.C. 2055 (e) (3))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend certain transitional rules for allowing a charitable contribution deduction for purposes of the estate tax in the case of bequests or transfers of certain charitable remainders.
